grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 虞犯【グハン】likelihood of committing a crime, pre-delinquent
虞犯少年【グハンショウネン】juvenile likely to commit a crime, juvenile with a criminal bent, pre-delinquent juvenile, status offender
kun reading compounds: 恐れ【おそれ】fear, horror, anxiety, concern, uneasiness, reverence
失敗の虞【しっぱいのおそれ】risk of failure
